amendment.description: To authorize the demolition of facilities and improvements on certain military installations approved for closure under the defense base closure and realignment process.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3539 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7381; text: CR S7381) To authorize the demolition of facilities and improvements on certain military installations approved for closure under the defense base closure and realignment process.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3539 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin.
